message: Thank you for the recommendation, Alice, but I'm hesitant to be the first buyer without any data to go on.  Since the odds of a low-quality product are twice as high as a high-quality one, I'd prefer to wait and see how the product fares with other buyers. If the sales record shows a high proportion of high-quality products, I'll gladly reconsider.

Thank you for the information, but I'm not comfortable buying a product with such a high chance of being low quality without any prior sales data to suggest otherwise.  Perhaps if there were more sales data showing a higher proportion of high-quality products, I would reconsider.
